entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:20 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 02:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
